text: Metropolia may mean: * Metropolis (religious jurisdiction), overseen by a metropolitan bishop * Diocese, or more particularly Archdiocese * Metropolia, the pre-1970 general term for the Russian Orthodox Greek Catholic Church in U.S.A., now known as the Orthodox Church in America * Metropolia, a Polish Business Magazine published in the UK since 2007 * Metropolia University of Applied Sciences, Helsinki Metropolitan Area, Finland
title: Metropolia
